# Layth Ayache

> AI systems engineer and technical consultant building AI infrastructure, automating workflows, and consulting for companies across telecom, finance, and healthcare.

## Canonical Identity
- Name: Layth Ayache
- Role: AI Systems Engineer & Technical Consultant
- Location: Beirut, Lebanon
- Website: https://laythayache.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/laythayache
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/laythayache

## Focus Areas
- AI systems design and deployment
- Computer vision and accessibility technology
- Predictive analytics and NLP automation
- OCR pipelines and document processing
- Network engineering and infrastructure
- Technical consulting for startups and enterprises

## Key Pages
- Home: https://laythayache.com/
- OmniSign Case Study: https://laythayache.com/projects/omnisign

## Projects
- [OmniSign](https://laythayache.com/projects/omnisign) | status: ongoing | updated: 2026-02-16
  AI-powered Lebanese Sign Language translation system with privacy-first on-device inference and real-time interaction.
- [License Plate Recognition System](https://laythayache.com/projects/license-plate-recognition) | status: completed | updated: 2025-11-12
  Real-time license plate detection and OCR pipeline for roadway and parking workflows.
- [Face Recognition System](https://laythayache.com/projects/face-recognition) | status: completed | updated: 2025-08-20
  Real-time face recognition workflow for identity matching and access scenarios.
- [Breast Cancer Detection Model](https://laythayache.com/projects/breast-cancer-detection) | status: completed | updated: 2025-07-18
  Supervised machine learning classification model for early-stage breast cancer risk detection.
- [Home Security Embedded System](https://laythayache.com/projects/home-security-system) | status: completed | updated: 2025-06-02
  IoT security system using embedded sensors, Bluetooth presence logic, and app-based controls.
- [Network Security Infrastructure](https://laythayache.com/projects/network-infrastructure) | status: completed | updated: 2025-05-22
  Enterprise network design with segmented VLAN architecture, hardened perimeter controls, and remote access policies.
